item.description:
Bring your dogs to take pictures with Santa for your holiday cards or just keepsakes. This event runs Saturday AND Sunday from 10-4. You can pre-register for a specific time here:


http://santa.doggieda...

The photos are great and don't forget it benefits a great cause! If you haven't been to Doggie Day care this is the perfect opportunity to check out the facility and services as our indoor meetups will be held here until the Spring.
item.how_to_find_us: My appointment is at 12:30-may or may not see you

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Paws & Claus holiday photos benefiting the Animal Rescue League of Boston
